(In reply to comment #0)

Please tell me the version of the birt which your used.
Thanks very much!
Can you give me your design file? Thanks.

hi, Sampath,
We design RunAndRenderTask with the precondition that every thread should have it's own instance of RunAndRenderTask. So RunAndRenderTask is not guaranteed to work correctly when some instance of RunAndRenderTask or ReportRunnable is shared by several threads.

Could you please check if you satisfied this precondition? Thanks.
The task can only be used by one thread.
